title: Emera Approves Quarterly Dividends
description: HALIFAX, Nova Scotia--(BUSINESS WIRE)--On April 3, 2020 the Board of Directors of Emera Inc. (TSX: EMA) approved quarterly dividends on its common shares and First Preferred Shares, each of which is payable on and after May 15, 2020 to the applicable sharehol…
